website_summaries.verdict: The all weather polyester net is durable and hard wearing, while the 1.5-inch diameter steel frame is sturdy.
pros: Durable all-weather, polyester net at 2.5 millimeters thick
Features reinforced net edging with a rugged tarpaulin net back pocket
The sturdy 1.5-inch diameter steel frame is powder coated and weather resistant

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: The goal is exactly as needed. My attacker is 10 years old and just needed something at home for shooting practice on off days and I definitely did not want to spend $100-$200 on one (atleast not until he is a HIGHLY skilled player). The frame is solid enough for child's play. The net was not a headache to attach and I did use zip ties at the corners for reinforcement. The goal is 4x4 so not too big and not too small. Lightweight and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Candidly KP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, good frame and great netting.
customer_reviews.text: The goal is easy to assemble and sturdy. While its not as strong as regulation, it’s perfect for backyard practice drills. The netting fits well and feels like the netting at the fields, very pleasantly surprised on that. Lacing the net to the frame with the included string was a no-go. A dozen zip ties had the net attached in five minutes and will be easily replaced as needed versus the lacing which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Goal!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this goal for a few months now and it has held up great. I have a son and daughter (13 and 14) who both use the net and love it. Set up was relatively easy, it took about 20 minutes. The goal is solid enough to take some heavy shots but still easy enough to move when its time to mow the lawn and the netting was thicker than I thought it would be. This is a GREAT goal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Score a Goal with this Net
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy and my granddaughter loves it. Let’s see if her lacrosse skills improve
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Rich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing net for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I baught the 6 by6 model and was amazing! For how inexpensive it was it was great! I've had it for 2 days and have been practicing for hours a day, and there are no sighns at all for usage. I baught it for my son and he loves it. It was not hard to set up except for the net which was a little tricky. The. Only downside is I baught mine new yet had chipped paint and looked like it had been used. If it didn't have that it would have been a definite 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: BOB B.

customer_reviews.title: That being said this is a great goal. It is light enough that even my ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about 4 months now. It was a royal pain to tie the net to the frame. As a matter of fact we ended up using zip ties to supplement the string wrapping and wish we would have only used zip ties it would have been so much easier. That being said this is a great goal. It is light enough that even my 6 year old daughter can move it around on her own. It is very sturdy. It has held up to my 8&10 year old hanging on it. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jason Crellin

customer_reviews.title: Go9d purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great net and well worth the price. The netting a little time consuming to put on but over all great product
customer_reviews.author: Mary gregory

customer_reviews.title: Nice lacrosse net
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a good size backyard lacrosse goal. Yes the net can be a bit difficult to get on, but if you take your time and get some help, it goes by pretty quickly. This should be a net we can use for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Barclay Bicksler

customer_reviews.title: It's fine for backyard goal practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a lie end goal. It's fine for backyard goal practice, except that it's too light. Once it was weighted down with rocks from the yard, my son was much happier with it
customer_reviews.author: boys mom

customer_reviews.title: Although it was on time delivery and easy assembly, the string provided in the package was ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it was on time delivery and easy assembly, the string provided in the package was so short that we could only tie half of the net. Our boy was very disappointed that he could not practice lacrosse with it until we bought additional string from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine or in on size.
customer_reviews.text: A little misleading. I thought I was buying the larger 6'x6' goal and was suprised when the 4'x4' goal was sent to me. Still a good purchase. As the goal is good for my kids 6 and 8 to shoot on. Just make sure you are buying the actual size you want.
customer_reviews.author: J Y

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal - the sewing of the net to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal - the sewing of the net to attach didn't work so well. We ended up using some zip ties. Ours also seems to lean forward at all times. I would not buy it again nor suggest it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Johnson

customer_reviews.title: MAX LAX FUN!
customer_reviews.text: This goal has been great for my 7 yr old son. He has been playing LAX for 1 1/2 years and this is just like the goals his team uses. He is careful not to use this goal for anything other than shooting LAX balls into and since he doesn't have the strength to whip the balls, the net Is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: PVBMOM

customer_reviews.title: Missing Major Parts
customer_reviews.text: There was a missing metal bar, and could not be put together.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: love it does the job
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely full size, love it does the job, light weight so its easily moveable to different places in the yard. My 9 year old can move it to different spots.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The net was very small for the goal frame. Some of the frame was dented and it was hard to put together since it dented.
customer_reviews.author: Michline Bahlul

customer_reviews.title: Great product. The net was a bit tedious to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The net was a bit tedious to put on. But overall good quality product. Perfect for my 9 year old to practice shooting in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: ygreene84

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband and he loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it. He and our son practice with it all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with net
customer_reviews.text: Good price,so so to put together, net ripped in the first half hour. Not very happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: peppino aiello

customer_reviews.title: The string to fasten the net to the poles is ...
customer_reviews.text: The string to fasten the net to the poles is a little small. Expect to pull tight and have someone help you.
customer_reviews.author: SaraH.

customer_reviews.title: all around good. I used zip ties instead of the threading ...
customer_reviews.text: all around good. I used zip ties instead of the threading that comes with the product. Took 10 minutes to assemble all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for the backyard but it dose take a while to string the net to the posts.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Points

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The pipes are definitely thin but for my 11 year they are plenty stout, for an older player with a harder shot, not sure it would take too many hits before denting or bending. Take your time to install the net well and this should last a long time. He loves having something to shoot at.
customer_reviews.author: Justus

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 14 and this is the perfect thing for playing lacrosse! It's not full sized but it works! It's a pail to weave the rope to the net to the metal so beware for you to take at least 1 hour to put it together
customer_reviews.author: Morgan nace

customer_reviews.title: This goal is perfect for he and his friends to practice
customer_reviews.text: My son just got into LAX. This goal is perfect for he and his friends to practice. I would suggest stronger string to tie the netting on though. His fell apart after one day of rigorous practice. The directions were not to difficult to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Buying New is Not New
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice if all the parts were new as I bought a new goal. Paint chipped, dirt in the pipes. This was bought as a new goal not a used. Conditions of goal make this a 2 but it's a good goal for practice so the product gets a 3
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: OK, but net is weak.
customer_reviews.text: Goal showed up as expected for our 14 year olds birthday. We put it together. By the end of the day, the net was coming apart. Not where it is attached to the goal, but the seams in the net itself. Goal itself is pretty sturdy, but the net is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Beachcivil

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coming "unstringed" other than that, kids are loving ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coming "unstringed" other than that, kids are loving it:)
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hodges

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for birthday gifts for my grandsons. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple to put frame together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to put frame together, but takes quite a bit to put on net. Also, came with broken brackets, but managed to make it work for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get any better for a real Lacrosse fan
customer_reviews.text: If you have a kid that's crazy for Lacrosse, you are going to make their year with this Franklin Sports goal. My son went absolutely crazy for it. His father and me, not as much - it was definitely a two person 'put together' job (and my husband is usually the one who can do these things by himself.) The thing is HUGE, but that's the point - it's definitely professional grade (for a kid), and it will make their playing all the more enjoyable. If you're a Lacrosse player, it just doesn't get any better. Just be prepared to spend the time assembling it (and make sure you have a place to put it!)
customer_reviews.author: Katy Lake

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a decent practice net. It was very easy to set up. It works just fine. I do like the SKLZ practice net better than this one as it is portable and easier to carry around. This one is a little heavier than the SKLZ net because of the metal frame. Overall though a decent net that my kids love to use.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This Franklin Sports Official Size Lacrosse Goal was fairly easy to put together. It's sturdy and seems like it will stand the test of time. We don't play competitively or anything, but this has worked just fine for infrequent family usage and outings. Overall I see no reason not to recommend this goal!
customer_reviews.author: Peace Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great  Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made of solid materials that should last a long time. My kids are using it for a soccer game as well as lacrosse which they are just starting to learn because we got this product and the kids became interested which is nice. They never even thought of trying the game but they are enjoying it. So as a family we are all learning it together and it is wonderful . I would have missed all the scrapes and bumps that came with this great sport. Alot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Steve J.

customer_reviews.title: Franklin Sports Official Size Lacrosse Goal
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to pt together. The paint chipped while assembling it Once assembled it's a good sized net , 72 in by 72 in by 72 in. Sturdy and robust but not really portable or collapsible. Should be assembled where it's going to live. Great for Lacrosse. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: new yorker

customer_reviews.title: Rigidly Stable Construction with Weather Resistant Polyester Net
customer_reviews.text: LaCrosse is my nephew's most recent passion, so I figured I would put this out back for he and his friends may practice. The metal pipe is quite rigid, and it has the push button snaps that pop up in through the mating tube hole for a secure, stable structure. The full-size net is made of weather-resistant polyester, and is sure to stand up through several seasons of use and abuse. The orange frame is easily visible, and the brand markings give it an official look. The quality of this piece of sporting equipment is exceptional, and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sullivan

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Backyard Lacrosse Goal - Kids Lacrosse Training Net - Lacrosse Training Equipment - Perfect for Youth Training & Recreation
product_meta.description: Franklin Sports Backyard Lacrosse Goal comes in two sizes, 48" W x 48" H and 72" W x 72" H. The 42" goal is perfect for youth backyard training and recreational play. The 72" goal is an official size lacrosse goal. Both goals are perfect for young players looking to practice their lacrosse skills and drills!
feature_bullets: SIZE: 48" W x 48" H x 48" D, 1.25" Diameter Steel Frame, and 2.5mm all-weather polyester net
INCLUDES: Comes with fitted net, steel frame, and rope ties for a stress-free assembly!
EASY ASSEMBLY: Goal has snap-lock frame for easy assembly
TRAINING + PRACTICE: This goal is perfect for practicing shooting skills and getting beginners used to the game!
EASY TO MOVE: Lightweight and easy to move around, this goal is perfect for backyard play
